title: Nwng swisw nangbai
lyrics:
Nwng swisw nangbai
"Thwijase dukhuthia Nwngni Jiua" -2
(A)
Fwthai khebso jabai Judasa
Petorabw bekhou fwlabai -2
Besedi dorshi khwmsi
Phorbu " O Phorbu"-2
(B)
Naihor honwi Menda bisaya
Songsarni pap biban banlangdwng -2
Besedi sohainangdwng
O Phorbu, O Jisu, O- Nwngw
